ygData.subject: Re: where is feign death and L16 summon pet spell . ..
ygData.msgSnippet: What is the web address for  The Necromonitor Can any higher up tell us what we should start looking for as far as spells go? I am worried that life will be
ygData.messageBody:
What is the web address for "The Necromonitor"
Can any higher up tell us what we should start looking for as far as spells
go?
I am worried that life will be very hard when I get higher lvl and need
certain spells but can't find them or learn how to make them.

----- Original Message -----
From: Mark Muller <markm@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 11:15 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] where is feign death and L16 summon pet spell
. ..


> From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
> I bought both of those in Neriak...pretty certain that Freeport will have
> what you need though, they seem to carry at least up to 16th lvl, and
> probably quite a few past that, though not all. On a related note...does
> anyone have an up to date list of spell components needed for necro
> research? The necromonitor has an older one, but it's very incomplete.
> Learning languages is not my way of having fun, not to mention I solo
almost
> exclusively so my opportunities to get spammed by gibberish are pretty few
> and far between.
>
